mapper.select: select inquiry_code as inquiryCode, inquiry_title as inquiryTitle, inquiry_content as inquiryContent, inquiry_category as inquiryCategory, inquiry_status as inquiryStatus, inquiry_email as inquiryEmail, create_at as createAt, update_at as updateAt from inquiry where mem_code = #{memberCode}
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry(mem_code, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_category, inquiry_status, inquiry_email) values(#{inquiryCode}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, #{inquiryCategory}, default, #{inquiryEmail})
